TEXT.English: The neural interface for ship control has been invented. It increases the efficiency of controlling a starship and provides a small improvement in capabilities.
TEXT.French: The neural interface for ship control has been invented. It increases the efficiency of controlling a starship and provides a small improvement in capabilities.
TEXT.German: The neural interface for ship control has been invented. It increases the efficiency of controlling a starship and provides a small improvement in capabilities.
TEXT.Italian: The neural interface for ship control has been invented. It increases the efficiency of controlling a starship and provides a small improvement in capabilities.
TEXT.Spanish: The neural interface for ship control has been invented. It increases the efficiency of controlling a starship and provides a small improvement in capabilities.

TEXT.English: Quantum power sources and engines have been developed. These allow for an increased range of operation and combat power for starbases, squadrons, and missiles. This upgrade is being implemented immediately. Also available is an upgrade for ships.
TEXT.French: Quantum power sources and engines have been developed. These allow for an increased range of operation and combat power for starbases, squadrons, and missiles. This upgrade is being implemented immediately. Also available is an upgrade for ships.
TEXT.German: Quantum power sources and engines have been developed. These allow for an increased range of operation and combat power for starbases, squadrons, and missiles. This upgrade is being implemented immediately. Also available is an upgrade for ships.
TEXT.Italian: Quantum power sources and engines have been developed. These allow for an increased range of operation and combat power for starbases, squadrons, and missiles. This upgrade is being implemented immediately. Also available is an upgrade for ships.
TEXT.Spanish: Quantum power sources and engines have been developed. These allow for an increased range of operation and combat power for starbases, squadrons, and missiles. This upgrade is being implemented immediately. Also available is an upgrade for ships.

TEXT.English: The neural interface used for ship control has been improved.
TEXT.French: The neural interface used for ship control has been improved.
TEXT.German: The neural interface used for ship control has been improved.
TEXT.Italian: The neural interface used for ship control has been improved.
TEXT.Spanish: The neural interface used for ship control has been improved.

TEXT.English: Good news! A free upgrade for all military ships, including squadrons and starbases.
TEXT.French: Good news! A free upgrade for all military ships, including squadrons and starbases.
TEXT.German: Good news! A free upgrade for all military ships, including squadrons and starbases.
TEXT.Italian: Good news! A free upgrade for all military ships, including squadrons and starbases.
TEXT.Spanish: Good news! A free upgrade for all military ships, including squadrons and starbases.

TEXT.English: Good news! A free upgrade for squadrons, starbases, and missiles. Missiles? Yep, missiles.
TEXT.French: Good news! A free upgrade for squadrons, starbases, and missiles. Missiles? Yep, missiles.
TEXT.German: Good news! A free upgrade for squadrons, starbases, and missiles. Missiles? Yep, missiles.
TEXT.Italian: Good news! A free upgrade for squadrons, starbases, and missiles. Missiles? Yep, missiles.
TEXT.Spanish: QGood news! A free upgrade for squadrons, starbases, and missiles. Missiles? Yep, missiles.

TEXT.English: Another free upgrade for all military ships? This must be my lucky day.
TEXT.French: Another free upgrade for all military ships? This must be my lucky day.
TEXT.German: Another free upgrade for all military ships? This must be my lucky day.
TEXT.Italian: Another free upgrade for all military ships? This must be my lucky day.
TEXT.Spanish: Another free upgrade for all military ships? This must be my lucky day.
